title: How can we write mail asking for project requirements to proceed development? - Quora

response.answer_text: The question is very vague. But to answer this and for that matter any mail communication which you are thinking of writing needs to have the below framework which ensures the maximum clarity. This is called W5H framework and this is briefly “What needs to be done? Why it needs to be done? Who needs to do this? When it will be done? Where it will be done? How it needs to be done?” Just ensure that your mail has all the questions around the above, so that you get the most optimum response that you may be looking for.
